name: AblativeAirbrake
title: Ablative Airbrake
description: Also known as 'Interplanetary Dyson X-15' and Derived from A.I.R.B.R.A.K.E.S and heatshield technologies,to keep it cool this airbrake is coated with ablator... while there are still some. <color=orange>Beware: the deployment mechanism doesn't like really much overheating.</color>
